title: When Phil Robertson Put Miss Kay in a Headlock
description:
Uncle Si tells the true story of the time Phil Robertson put Miss Kay in a headlock and lived to tell the tale. Godwin has never been this fired up, but the boys finally figured out what grinds his gears: stupidity. John-David admits he joined a lawsuit against a popular energy drink company. Oprah's Favorite Things don't hold a candle to Martin's. A fan outs Phillip McMillan as a member of a breakdancing group. And the boys settle the age-old question: Is it OK to talk with your wife while you're on the toilet?
-
